org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 ReactiveClusterServerCommands

  • 所有超级接口:
    ReactiveServerCommands

    public interface ReactiveClusterServerCommands
extends ReactiveServerCommands
    Redis Server commands executed in cluster environment using reactive infrastructure.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Mono<String> bgReWriteAof(RedisClusterNode node)
      Start an Append Only File rewrite process on the specific server.
      Mono<String> bgSave(RedisClusterNode node)
      Start background saving of db on server.
      Mono<Long> dbSize(RedisClusterNode node)
      Get the total number of available keys in currently selected database.
      Mono<String> flushAll(RedisClusterNode node)
      Delete all all keys from all databases.
      Mono<String> flushDb(RedisClusterNode node)
      Delete all keys of the currently selected database.
      Flux<RedisClientInfo> getClientList(RedisClusterNode node)
      Request information and statistics about connected clients.
      Mono<Properties> getConfig(RedisClusterNode node, String pattern)
      Load configuration parameters for given pattern from server.
      Mono<Properties> info(RedisClusterNode node)
      Load default server information like memory cpu utilization replication
      Mono<Properties> info(RedisClusterNode node, String section)
      Load server information for given selection.
      Mono<Long> lastSave(RedisClusterNode node)
      Get time unix timestamp of last successful ReactiveServerCommands.bgSave() operation in seconds.
      Mono<String> resetConfigStats(RedisClusterNode node)
      Reset statistic counters on server.
      Mono<String> save(RedisClusterNode node)
      Synchronous save current db snapshot on server.
      Mono<String> setConfig(RedisClusterNode node, String param, String value)
      Set server configuration for param to value.
      Mono<Long> time(RedisClusterNode node)
      Request server timestamp using TIME command.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.redis.connection.ReactiveServerCommands

        bgReWriteAof, bgSave, dbSize, flushAll, flushDb, getClientList, getClientName, getConfig, info, info, killClient, lastSave, resetConfigStats, save, setClientName, setConfig, time

    • 方法详细资料

      • bgReWriteAof

        Mono<String> bgReWriteAof(RedisClusterNode node)
        Start an Append Only File rewrite process on the specific server.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono indicating command completion.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.bgReWriteAof()

      • bgSave

        Mono<String> bgSave(RedisClusterNode node)
        Start background saving of db on server.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono indicating command received by server. Operation success needs to be checked via lastSave(RedisClusterNode).
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.bgSave()

      • lastSave

        Mono<Long> lastSave(RedisClusterNode node)
        Get time unix timestamp of last successful ReactiveServerCommands.bgSave() operation in seconds.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        @return Mono wrapping unix timestamp.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.lastSave()

      • save

        Mono<String> save(RedisClusterNode node)
        Synchronous save current db snapshot on server.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono indicating command completion.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.save()

      • dbSize

        Mono<Long> dbSize(RedisClusterNode node)
        Get the total number of available keys in currently selected database.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono wrapping number of keys.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.dbSize()

      • flushDb

        Mono<String> flushDb(RedisClusterNode node)
        Delete all keys of the currently selected database.
        参数:
        node - must not be null. Mono indicating command completion.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.flushDb()

      • flushAll

        Mono<String> flushAll(RedisClusterNode node)
        Delete all all keys from all databases.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono indicating command completion.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.flushAll()

      • info

        Mono<Properties> info(RedisClusterNode node)
        Load default server information like
        • memory
        • cpu utilization
        • replication

        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono wrapping server information.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.info()

      • info

        Mono<Properties> info(RedisClusterNode node,
                      String section)
        Load server information for given selection.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        section - must not be null nor empty.
        返回:
        Mono wrapping server information of given section.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - when section is null or empty.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.info(String)

      • getConfig

        Mono<Properties> getConfig(RedisClusterNode node,
                           String pattern)
        Load configuration parameters for given pattern from server.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        pattern - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono wrapping configuration parameters matching given pattern.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - when pattern is null or empty.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.getConfig(String)

      • setConfig

        Mono<String> setConfig(RedisClusterNode node,
                       String param,
                       String value)
        Set server configuration for param to value.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        param - must not be null nor empty.
        value - must not be null nor empty.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - when pattern / value is null or empty.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.setConfig(String, String)

      • resetConfigStats

        Mono<String> resetConfigStats(RedisClusterNode node)
        Reset statistic counters on server.
        Counters can be retrieved using ReactiveServerCommands.info().
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono indicating command completion.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.resetConfigStats()

      • time

        Mono<Long> time(RedisClusterNode node)
        Request server timestamp using TIME command.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono wrapping current server time in milliseconds.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.time()

      • getClientList

        Flux<RedisClientInfo> getClientList(RedisClusterNode node)
        Request information and statistics about connected clients.
        参数:
        node - must not be null.
        返回:
        Flux emitting RedisClientInfo objects.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - when node is null.
        另请参阅:
        RedisServerCommands.getClientList()
